text: us vyakti se badhakar zaalim kaun hoga jise usake rab kee aayaton ke dvaara samajhaaya gaya, to usane unase munh pher liya aur use bhool gaya, jo saamaan usake haath aage badha chuke hai? nishchay hee hamane unake dilon par parade daal die hai ki kaheen ve use samajh na len aur unake kaanon mein bojh daal diya (ki kaheen ve sun na le) . yadyapi tum unhen seedhe maarg kee or bulao, ve kabhee bhee maarg nahin pa sakate
